item.title: Hacking
item.description: Tools and web resources about hacking. Libraries Blog Directory of blog Directory of tools Awesome list Videos Tools file: recognizing the type of data contained in a computer file strings: finds and prints text strings embedded in binary files such as executables xxd: hex dump binwalk: Binwalk is a fast, easy to use tool for analyzing, reverse engineering, and extracting firmware images.
